Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings)

Value.label: Destination routine enabled
Value.Help: Enables an internal routine that periodically checks the Z-Wave device in assocication group 2

Value.label: Destination routine success time
Value.Help: Configure the time that the AlarmSound sends a new frame when previous frame was send successful

Value.label: Destination routine failed time
Value.Help: Configure the time that the AlarmSound sends a few frame when previous frame was send not successful

Value.label: Temperature calibration offset (byte 1)
Value.Help: A (signed) offset to calibrate the onboard temperature sensor

Value.label: Temperature calibration offset (byte 2)
Value.Help: A (signed) offset to calibrate the onboard temperature sensor

Value.label: Select index sound/light mode
Value.Help: The index of the sound mode when a switch binary/basic set frame is received

Value.label: Power offline sound/light mode
Value.Help: The index of the sound mode when the AlarmSound will start when it is unplugged

Value.label: Error sound/light mode
Value.Help: The index of the sound mode when the AlarmSound will play when it is unable to reach the device in association group 2

Value.label: Sound/Light index 1
Value.Help: Params 10 until 27 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 1 is selected

Value.label: Sound/Light index 2
Value.Help: Params 28 until 45 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 2 is selected

Value.label: Sound/Light index 3
Value.Help: Params 46 until 63 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 3 is selected

Value.label: Sound/Light index 4
Value.Help: Params 64 until 81 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 4 is selected

Value.label: Sound/Light index 5
Value.Help: Params 82 until 99 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 5 is selected

Value.label: Sound/Light index 6
Value.Help: Params 100 until 117 are the values to configure the sound and light thtat are played when index 6 is selected
